description: The pane serves as a container for axes and backgrounds for circular gauges and polar charts.

children.name: background
children.description: An array of background items for the pane.

children.name: center
children.description: The center of a polar chart or angular gauge, given as an array of [x, y] positions. Positions can be given as integers that transform to pixels, or as percentages of the plot area size.

children.name: endAngle
children.description:
The end angle of the polar X axis or gauge value axis, given in degrees where 0 is north. Defaults to startAngle

  • 360.

samples.name: VU-meter with custom start and end angle

children.name: innerSize
children.description: The inner size of the pane, either as a number defining pixels, or a percentage defining a percentage of the pane's size.

children.name: size
children.description: The size of the pane, either as a number defining pixels, or a percentage defining a percentage of the available plot area (the smallest of the plot height or plot width).

children.name: startAngle
children.description: The start angle of the polar X axis or gauge axis, given in degrees where 0 is north. Defaults to 0.

samples.name: VU-meter with custom start and end angle
